mapper.select: SELECT a.asset_seq ,asset_number ,kubun_code ,purchase_date ,warranty_period ,buy_to ,purchase_price ,status_code ,maker_name ,model_name ,serial_num ,interface_col ,os_name ,os_product_key ,cpu_processor ,operating_frequency ,memory ,memory_upgarde ,hdd ,hdd_upgarde ,mac_lan ,mac_wireless ,other ,security_bios ,security_hdd ,admin_account_id ,admin_account_pwd ,storage_location ,b.accessories_seq acc_accessories_seq ,b.asset_seq acc_asset_seq ,b.item_name acc_item_name ,b.item_spec acc_item_spec ,b.item_quantity acc_item_quantity ,b.remarks acc_remarks ,c.history_seq mt_history_seq ,c.asset_seq mt_asset_seq ,c.implementation_date mt_implementation_date ,c.implementation_detail mt_implementation_detail ,c.rep_id mt_rep_id ,c.approver_id mt_approver_id FROM asset a LEFT JOIN accessories b ON a.asset_seq = b.asset_seq LEFT JOIN maintenance_history c ON a.asset_seq = c.asset_seq WHERE a.asset_seq = #{assetSeq} ORDER BY asset_seq ASC, acc_accessories_seq ASC, history_seq ASC
SELECT code_detail_id, code_detail_name FROM code_detail WHERE code_master_id = '001'
SELECT code_detail_id, code_detail_name, item1, item2 FROM code_detail WHERE code_master_id = '002'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO accessories( accessories_seq, asset_seq, item_name, item_spec, item_quantity, remarks, insert_id, update_id ) VALUES ( (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(accessories_seq) + 1, 1) FROM accessories b), #{assetSeq}, #{itemName}, #{itemSpec}, #{itemQuantity}, #{remarks}, #{insertId}, #{updateId})

INSERT INTO maintenance_history( history_seq, asset_seq, implementation_date, implementation_detail, rep_id, approver_id, insert_id, update_id ) VALUES ( (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(accessories_seq) + 1, 1) FROM accessories b), #{assetSeq}, #{implementationDate}, #{implementationDetail}, #{repId}, #{approverId}, #{insertId}, #{updateId})
